name: Guideline
description:
Strox the hatchery attendant is having a bad day. The guideline for the egg conveyor has broken and the eggs are scattered around the hatchery. Strox needs your help. Can you guide the conveyor and save the eggs?

Plan the route by placing directions in the grid and guide the conveyor to pick up the eggs and transport then to matching nests.

The conveyor will pick up any egg that is next to an empty side and within its capacity. Eggs will be held by the conveyor until carried to an appropriate nest, or destroyed. Up to 4 eggs can be carried at one time, if the conveyor capacity has been increased.

Plan the route to avoid all obstacles and save the eggs.

Fill all nests to complete the level.
